actions.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.
Executive Comment Requested from US Copyright Off.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to amend title 17, United States Code, to clarify the derivative works exception to the termination of a copyright grant.

summary.text: Amends the copyright law to entitle a person exercising a termination right to receive royalties from a derivative work utilizing the copyrighted material subsequent to the termination.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 17, United States Code, to clarify the derivative works exception to the termination of a copyright grant.
